definition: lit. ten thousand stampeding horses (idiom)/fig. with great momentum/going full speed ahead
surname Wan
ten thousand/a great number
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to go to/to head for/towards
to hurry/to rush/to run quickly/to elope
to soar/to gallop/to prance/to turn over/to vacate/to clear

sentences.english: Sound like force of a thunderbolt, potential, such as full steam ahead.
sentences.chinese: 聲似雷霆萬鈞，勢如萬馬奔騰。

sentences.english: The Yellow River surges onward like ten thousand horses galloping.
sentences.chinese: 黃河以萬馬奔騰之勢滾滾向前。

sentences.english: The scene of thousands of steeds galloping I would never forget all my life.
sentences.chinese: 那萬馬奔騰的場面我這一輩子也忘不了。

sentences.english: The raindrop dozen seem war drum thunder Ming on the window and ten thousand horses dash about.
sentences.chinese: 雨點打在窗戶上，就像是戰鼓雷鳴，萬馬奔騰。

sentences.english: Our educational work is like a hundred flowers in bloom, like ten thousnd horses galloping ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我們的教育事業，正如百花齊放，萬馬奔騰。

sentences.english: On the boundless wasteland, thousands of horses are galloping ahead in the dust rising from all directions.
sentences.chinese: 在一望無際的荒原上，萬馬奔騰，塵煙四起。

sentences.english: The very earth trembled as with the tramp of horses and murmur of angry men.
sentences.chinese: 連大地都震動了，彷彿萬馬奔騰，千夫怒吼。

sentences.english: His palpitation now is surged as thousands of horses are surging forward.
sentences.chinese: 此刻他的心跳有如萬馬奔騰。

definition: ocean wave/billows
raging waves/stormy waves

(last line of the poem 望岳 by Tang poet Du Fu 杜甫[Du4 Fu3]) with one look I shall see all the smaller mountains down below (from the summit of Mt Tai 泰山[Tai4 Shan1])/(fig.) awe-inspiring view from a very high place
perilous situation
to cross (a road, an ocean etc)/to cut across
to float/to drift
turbid flow/muddy waters/fig. a contemptible person/fig. corrupt or disgraceful social trends
mountain/hill/lofty mountain
surging forward with great momentum/unfolding on a magnificent scale
fairyland/honorific: your homeland
pontoon bridge
at one's ease/carefree
so deep one cannot see to the bottom/limitless
mountain and river exhausted (idiom); at the end of the line/nowhere to go
quiet and comfortable
(bird species of China) northern goshawk (Accipiter gentilis)
